text: Khuzdar () district is in the centre of Balochistan province of Pakistan. Khuzdar is the capital of Khuzdar district. ==Administration== The district is administratively subdivided into five tehsils, these are: * Khuzdar Tehsil * Karkh Tehsil * Naal Tehsil * Wadh Tehsil * Zehri Tehsil Category:Districts of Balochistan (Pakistan)
title: Khuzdar District
